title: Congratulating Ashley Briggs upon the occasion of receiving the Girl Scout Gold Award, the most prestigious honor a Girl Scout can earn
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION congratulating Ashley Briggs upon the occasion of
receiving  the  Girl Scout Gold Award, the most prestigious honor a Girl
Scout can earn

WHEREAS, Ashley Briggs of Sodus, New York, will be honored with the Girl
Scout Gold Award, the highest award and Girl Scouting's highest achieve-
ment, at the Young Women of Distinction Event to be held in  the  Spring
of 2011; and
  WHEREAS, Girl Scouting has cultivated in our Nation's young people the
goals of building solid values of sisterhood and the importance of work-
ing  with  others, stimulating both mind and body, instilling pride, and
encouraging community service and success; and
  WHEREAS, Girl Scouting has expanded  the  horizons  of  the  countless
hundreds  of  thousands who have participated in Scouting programs which
have made Scouting an American and international institution; and
  WHEREAS, Ashley Briggs completed many  activities,  including  a  Gold
Award  community  service  project  which  she  planned,  developed  and
executed; and
  WHEREAS, For her project, Ashley Briggs made rag quilts  for  patients
at  Pines  of  Peace Hospice in Ontario, New York; she also taught other
Girl Scouts how to make these charming quilts; and
  WHEREAS, The Gold Award symbolizes outstanding accomplishments in  the
areas  of  leadership,  community  service, career planning and personal
development; it is tangible evidence of Ashley Briggs's  high  character
and commitment, and is a harbinger of her future service to her communi-
ty, New York State and our Nation; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative body pause in its deliberations, in
recognition of Ashley Briggs's achievement in  earning  the  Girl  Scout
Gold  Award,  and  wishing  her success, health and happiness; and be it
further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Ashley Briggs, Sodus, New York.
